column2: "Adehyedzi mu na Kraest ama yɛagye hɛnho; dɛm ntsi hom ngyina pintsinn
column3: na mma hom mma kwan ma wɔnnyɛ hom nkowaa bio."

column4: sɛ hom ma homho kwan ma wotwa hom twatsia a
column5: nna Kraest nnyɛ hom mfaso bi."

column2: "Na mitsi mu bio kyerɛ obiara a ɔgye twatsiatwa no dɛ
column4: otwar dɛ odzi mbra no nyina do."

column2: "Hom a hom pɛ dɛ wobu hom bem wɔ mbra no mu no
column3: wɔatsew hom efi Kraest mu; hom efi adom no ho ahwe ase."
yɛnam Sunsum mu dua gyedzi do tweɔn tsenenee enyidado no."

column6: na mbom gyedzi a ɔnam ɔdɔ do yɛ edwuma a."

column3: na woana na oesiw hom kwan dɛ mma hom nntsie nokwar no."

column2: "Mowɔ awerɛhyɛmu wɔ hom ho wɔ Ewuradze mu dɛ hom ronndwen biribi fofor bi: na nyia ɔretan hom enyi no

column4: sɛ meda ho ka twatsiasɛm a
column5: nkyɛ ɔyɛ dɛn na wɔda ho tseetsee me yi? Ɔno dze nna mbeamudua no ho fintsidua no aba ewiei."

column3: nkyɛ hɔn a wɔma hom adwen mu yɛ hom basabasa no edzi hɔnara hɔn ho ewu."

column5: na adehyedzi no mma hom kwan ma hom nnhyɛ honam apɛdze ma
column6: na mbom hom ndua ɔdɔ do nsonsom homho."

column2: "Na mbra no nyina ahyɛ ma wɔ asɛm kor mu
column3: ɔno nye yi; Dɔ wo nyɛnko dɛ wankasa woho."
na hom memen homho nkorkor a
column4: hom nhwɛ yie amma hom aannsɛɛ homho."
na mma hom nnhyɛ honam akɔndɔ ma."

column5: amma hom aannyɛ ndzɛmba a hom pɛ."

column2: "Na sɛ Sunsum no kyerɛ hom kwan a
column3: nna hom nnyi mbra no ase."

column2: "Na honam su ndwuma no da edzi pefee
column20: nye dza ɔtsetse dɛm a meka kyerɛ hom kotoo
column21: dɛ mbrɛ maka akyerɛ hom dada no
column22: dɛ hɔn a wɔyɛ dɛm ndzɛmba no rinnya Nyankopɔn ahendzi no."

column11: ahohyɛdo; mbra bi nnyi hɔ tsia yinom."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔyɛ Kraest Jesus dze no
column3: wɔabɔ honam nhyɛdodze nye n’akɔndɔ nyina mbeamudua mu."

column2: "Sɛ yɛtse ase wɔ Sunsum mu a
column3: hom mma yɛnnantsew Sunsum mu so."

column2: "Mma yɛnnyɛ enyimnyampɛ hun nnyiyi hɛnho ebufuw
